short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab experience with Sasuke Uchiha from Naruto in his most intense form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this Chrome Extension, embrace the power and determination of Sasuke as his dark resolve is captured in a stunning live wallpaper.

Features:
🌌 Live Wallpaper: Watch Sasuke's battle-ready stance come to life with dynamic animations that bring energy to your new tab.
⏰ Clock & Date: Stay on schedule with the clock and date display, seamlessly integrated into your new tab.
🔎 Google Search Bar: Effortlessly search the web with a customizable search bar that uses your preferred search engine.
📌 Add & Remove Shortcuts: Personalize your browsing with the option to add or remove site shortcuts for easy access.
Why You Should Install:
With Sasuke's Dark Resolve, every new tab is an epic journey into the world of ninjas. This extension brings both beauty and power to your browsing experience, making it ideal for anime fans and those seeking inspiration from Sasuke’s strength.

Check out more anime-inspired extensions like Naruto Shippuden, Sasuke Uchiha, and Naruto Live Wallpaper on the Chrome Web Store!
